BR_text.BRsummary: [gcp click-to-deploy] hostname field is not editable
BR_text.BRdescription:
Repro instructions
 <denchmark-code>cd components/gcp-click-to-deploy
 npm install
 npm start
 
 # Open web ui
 # Try editing the hostname field in the form
 </denchmark-code>
 
 Browser: Chrome
